item.title: Scoop
item.description: Instal # https://scoop.sh/ iwr -useb get.scoop.sh | iex # if error Set-ExecutionPolicy RemoteSigned -scope CurrentUser scoop install 7zip git scoop bucket add extras scoop install everything diskgenius postman hugo nvm error 重装系统后无法找到scoop菜单和程序 # powershell运行 scoop reset *
